category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Man Surfing, Type-5 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Surfer, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-5, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16  http://emojipedia.org/man-surfing-type-5/
name: man surfing: medium-dark skin tone

bn:00094620v: To ride a wave, usually on a surfboard.
To use a surfboard; to surf.
Ride the waves of the sea with a surfboard

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00075390n: Surfing is a surface water sport in which the wave rider, referred to as a surfer, rides on the forward or deep face of a moving wave, which is usually carrying the surfer towards the shore.
Surfing is a surface water sport in which the participant is carried along the face of a breaking wave, most commonly using a surfboard.
The sport of riding a surfboard toward the shore on the crest of a wave
Sport that consists of riding a wave
The sport of riding a surfboard using the power of the waves
The pastime or sport of riding surf on a surfboard.
Maneuver where the surfer turns and surfs back towards where the wave is breaking.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man surfing emoji showcases a dynamic figure with a medium-dark skin tone, caught mid-wave with a sense of exhilaration. The water is rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, creating shimmering highlights and cool blues that evoke the ocean's spray.  His athletic posture and the subtle gloss on his skin, characteristic of Apple's 3D design, convey action, adventure, and the thrill of mastering the waves.
